title: NestJS v10 Snippets
description: Production-ready code snippets for NestJS v10 applications. A progressive Node.js framework with TypeScript support, decorators, and dependency injection.
installNote: Install snippets with: npx hanma add <snippet-name> --framework nest

concept.whatIsASnippet: A snippet is a single, self-contained code file that provides a specific utility, decorator, guard, interceptor, or integration. Snippets are designed to be dropped into your project and customized as needed.
whenToUseSnippets: When you need a specific decorator, guard, or interceptor
When you want copy-paste code you own and can modify
When you prefer composition over packages

snippetsVsPackages.snippets: Code you own - copy, paste, modify freely
snippetsVsPackages.packages: External dependencies - updates managed by maintainers
snippetsVsPackages.benefit: Snippets give you full control and no dependency bloat
